data.title: Jimmie Allen - Age, Family, Bio
data.meta_description: Jimmie Allen: his birthday, what he did before fame, his family life, fun trivia facts, popularity rankings, and more.
data.text:
About

Country singer from Delaware who has gained over 500,000 followers on Instagram. He signed with BBR Music Group's Stoney Creek Records. He earned praise for his 2018 album Mercury Lane.

Before Fame

He made his debut at the Grand Ole Opry in Nashville in May 2018.

Trivia

His song "Best Shot" was named the #1 Top Spun song on Pandora New Country station in 2018. The song was streamed over one million times on Spotify.

Family Life

He is from Milton, Delaware. In 2021, he was married Lexi Allen. The couple has two daughters Naomi and Zara. He also has a son named Aadyn from previous relationship. In April 2023, he and Lexi announced that they were expecting a third child together as well as their separation. They welcomed their third child, Cohen Ace James, in September 2023.

Associated With
